## DEPTH\_PRE\_PASS\_STENCIL\_MASK variable

Bitmask used for the depth pre-pass to prevent multiple fragments in the same screen position from rendering color.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
DEPTH_PRE_PASS_STENCIL_MASK = 1
```
